metadata.description: SAPIENZ is a collection of 15,000 networked playable characters created in partnership between STAPLEVERSE and RHYMEZLIKEDIMEZ. Imagine a reality where the marriage of art and commerce is seamless, where creativity is the currency and collaboration the fuel that powers our collective evolution. This is not merely a vision of the future, but a tangible reality within your grasp with the SAPIENZ world. The goal is to build the next 100+ years of street culture, are you in?
metadata.name: Sapienz #1
